Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.title: What is the primary characteristic of facial vascular pain?

option_a.title: Facial pain that worsens with movement

option_b.title: Facial pain that worsens with temperature changes

option_c.title: Facial pain that worsens with pressure

option_d.title: Facial pain that worsens with movement and temperature changes

correct_option.title: Option D
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
